profile.bio: Bachelor in computer science and business studies, internet architect. Helped an airline transition to e-tickets, secured multiple home-banking systems, protected thousands of laptops against data-theft, discovered new ways to secure Bitcoin and created new applications utilizing its underlying blockchain technology.
